snippet: EU nations reached a compromise on long-awaited reforms to the carbon emissions market on Tuesday, moving the European Union closer to adopting key rules to deliver on its pledge to cut greenhouse gas emissions under the Paris climate accord....

headline.main: EU Nations Thrash Out Deal on Carbon Market Reform
headline.print_headline: EU Nations Thrash Out Deal on Carbon Market Reform

lead_paragraph: EU nations reached a compromise on long-awaited reforms to the carbon emissions market on Tuesday, moving the European Union closer to adopting key rules to deliver on its pledge to cut greenhouse gas emissions under the Paris climate accord.
